revision.comment: Created page with "Possibly: Mr. Daniel Perreau's narrative of his unhappy case... from the commencement of Mr...Perreau's connexion with Mrs. Rudd, until the time of his trial...truly and can..."
revision.text: Possibly: Mr. Daniel Perreau's narrative of his unhappy case... from the commencement of Mr...Perreau's connexion with Mrs. Rudd, until the time of his trial...truly and candidly laid before the public; together with his defence. Published by himself. (Daniel Perreau). (London : Printed for T. Evans, 1775). http://library.st-andrews.ac.uk/record=b1306489~S1
